channel.title: ~~~Hack Y0u12 Xbox the 1inux w4y~~~
channel.description:
Stuff that you need: Action Replay Splinter cell is the best or 007 james bond or mech assalt Xbox :cool: the right programs which i will edit this post when i get out of the libary ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Ussaly People that wanan mod there xbox r really wanan mod in halo 2 I am one of the best modders on xbox live so i can really help.
First you must have your Action replay ready after that you must find a game save for evolution x or unleash x on [url=http://www.se7ensins.com]www.se7ensins.com[/url] thats the best site to go if my way doesn't work.
After you have found a kool gamesave that you think will work follow the instructions on the page that you downloaded it from.
If you have splinter cell load it up and you will find a game save called linux use the checkpoint to go the dashboard installtion screen this will change your way of gaming for ever install from the way it shows at the download page.
after it is installed stay at you modded dashboard ~~~this is part 2 for modding halo i will do this once i get out the libary and i will have some of the stuff up for download once i get home.~~~
